io.spine.server.transport

Interface MessageChannel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Publisher
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractChannel, InMemoryPublisher, InMemorySubscriber, Subscriber

    public interface MessageChannel
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable
    A channel dedicated to exchanging the messages.

    Equipped with a channel identifier, serving to distinguish this channel among other channels in the application.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      io.spine.server.integration.ChannelId getId()
      An identifier of this channel.
      boolean isStale()
      Allows to understand whether this channel is stale and can be closed.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.AutoCloseable

        close

      • isStale

        boolean isStale()
        Allows to understand whether this channel is stale and can be closed.
        Returns:
        true if the channel is stale, false otherwise
